attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app because trump had my heart. The whole time it was downloading I was jumping around with such excitement. Bait the second it finished  downloading my phone shut down. I was really confused but assumed I just ran low on battery or something. When I managed to turn it back on my phone half my apps were missing, all my unread emails had been opened and half were deleted, same thing with all my texts. I also had tons of my pictures deleted. This app made me reconsider my support for our president. I donâ€™t know what he did or what his team did to cause this but I feel truly invaded and hurt by it. Please do not get this unless you are willing to have your phoneâ€™s privacy invaded.
